title: Still the Love of His Life
description: In "Still the Love of His Life," Death stalks the corridors at Maggieâ€™s hospital, and serial killer ex, Rob, begins to send her threatening letters from behind bars. As if that wasn't enough, someone is also killing her patients at the hospital where she works.With Phil, a seemingly harmless admirer, following her every move, Maggie can't help but wonder if he's involved in the terrifying events that are unfolding around her.As the killings continue and the threats against her escalate, Maggie and the police must race against time to uncover the link between Rob, the killer on the loose, and Phil before it's too late. Will they solve the mystery before she becomes the next victim?"Still the Love of His Life" is a gripping and heart-pounding thriller that will keep you on the edge of your seat until the very last page.
author: Molly Garcia
